ValidationRule.description: US-0008996 - [Docusign]Making Legal Entity Contact creation a mandatory step for Contract creation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT($Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EBH_ACP' ,RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EBH_ListingAgreement' ,RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EBH_RevenueShare'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Draft') , OR(ISBLANK( Business_Contact__c ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Business_Contact__c )) , OR( ISBLANK(Business_Contact__r.FirstName) ,ISBLANK(Business_Contact__r.LastName),ISBLANK( Business_Contact__r.Email )) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select or create a new Seller Signatory Contact with First Name, Last Name and Primary Email populated.
